reviewText: Sometime over the Summer, I'll get to watch it!
Bought it for my Aunt and she loved it. Delivery was fast.  Thanks

I just received this DVD in the mail today & it's playing now. I may be up late in the evening to watch it to the end.  I saw Daniel last fall in Minot, ND at the HostFest - fulfilling a many year wish to see & hear him in person.  He is indeed wonderful & was well worth the wait.  This DVD is from 1994 & I feel he is improving with age.  I love his shows on PBS & have his latest on my TV-DVR & have watched it many times already.
Ordered after taking mom to his live concert in Ft. Wayne.  The DVD made her day!
This is an excellent DVD. I would recommend it to anyone. I wish there were more DVDs currently being made of his Tour Concerts in the UK & in Ireland. I would certainly buy them.
If you like Daniel O'Donnell, you'll love this DVD! He's very entertaining and this DVD contains lots of his good songs!
